title: Yolanda Hadid cuddles up to new boyfriend on red carpet at Global Lyme Alliance Gala in NYC
text:
She documented her battle with Lyme disease on social media after contracting it in 2012.

And on Thursday, Yolanda Hadid continued her support of the Global Lyme Alliance as she stepped out for the organization's annual fundraising gala in New York.

The former Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills star, 55, was accompanied by her new boyfriend Joseph Jingoli and the couple cozied up on the red carpet as they posed for photos.

Date night: Yolanda Hadid, 55, walked the red carpet at the Global Lyme Alliance Gala in New York on Thursday night with her new boyfriend Joseph Jingoli

New romance: The couple put on a public display of affection as they posed for photos. Yolanda confirmed their relationship in August via social media

Yolanda confirmed her relationship with the businessman back in August via social media.

She had previously been married from 2011 to 2017 to music producer David Foster and before that, to property developer Mohamed Hadid from 1994 to 2000 with whom she shares children Gigi, Bella and Anwar.

It was during her marriage to Foster that she went public with her Lyme disease diagnosis in 2012 and subsequently said her daughter Bella, 23, and son Anwar, 20, were also diagnosed with it in 2015.

Meanwhile, her other daughter Gigi, 24, revealed in 2014 she suffers from Hashimoto's disease, an autoimmune condition.

The former Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills star wore an ivory satin dress with voluminous sleeves and bateau neckline. She added a pair of beige and perspex heels

Feeling better: Yolanda revealed in 2012 that she had been diagnosed with Lyme disease. She told People Thursday she is currently 'in remission' thanks to 'a new frequency healing device'

In an interview with People published Thursday, Yolanda shared: 'I’m in remission. I had a really bad year last year but I found a new frequency healing device and it’s been amazing for me.'

'It took away 90 percent of my symptoms. It helped with my joint pain, the exhaustion, the brain fog, all the symptoms that come with Lyme disease,' she said.

She also gushed about her new beau.

'It’s such a blessing to find someone so perfect for me in this time of my life,' she told the outlet.

'He rides horses, he loves nature, he loves the farm. To find love again at 55 is amazing.'

Found love again: She also gushed to People about Jingoli, saying: 'It’s such a blessing to find someone so perfect for me in this time of my life'
description: The former Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills star, 55, went public with her Lyme disease diagnosis in 2012. She told People Thursday that she is currently in remission.
